managment

Class UserLoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • managment.UserLoginController

  • public class UserLoginController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for user login screen here we allow users to log in via username and password only after accounts have been imported by outside user import
    Since:
    01.01.2022
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    matan weisberg

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      button for logging in
      private javafx.scene.control.Label login_res_lbl
      label for displaying login result to user incase of failure

      text area for password
      private javafx.scene.control.TextField username_lbl

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initialize()
      func to initialize our text areas to allow ENTER presses to attempt to login
      (package private) void login_action(javafx.event.Event event)
      Activates on button press we check for correct input by user if the username and password are correct we get the user information and log in the user showing him a home screen that fits that user type if input is incorrect we dispaly the correct error message

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        func to initialize our text areas to allow ENTER presses to attempt to login

      • login_action

        void login_action(javafx.event.Event event)
        Activates on button press we check for correct input by user if the username and password are correct we get the user information and log in the user showing him a home screen that fits that user type if input is incorrect we dispaly the correct error message
        Parameters:
        event - Action event for event details
